Html:
Hello,
I'm using NavigationCommands.GoToPage.Execute() to navigate between pages from my viewmodel.
It works fine when navigating to simple Uris but when I want to navigate to pages with a fragment, the frame is selected but the menu is deselected. It seems the selected source is not found in the menu. I think it tries to find the Uri without ignoring the fragment part.
I don't know exactly where in the code I should make a change for this to work...

edit: created an issue
